name: Reshiram & Zekrom GX
author: Naoki Saito

attacks.name: Fabled Flarebolts
attacks.effect: Discard up to 3 in any combination of basic {R} and basic {L} Energy cards from your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Cross Break GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. If you played N’s Resolve from your hand during this turn, this attack also does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent’s other Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
